fact_list.fact_text: The instrument panel or dashboard contains a temperature gauge.
The instrument panel or dashboard contains a speedometer.
The instrument panel or dashboard contains an odometer.
The instrument panel or dashboard contains a tripmeter.
The instrument panel or dashboard contains signal indicators and a hazard light indicator.
The instrument panel or dashboard contains a tachometer.
The instrument panel or dashboard contains a fuel gauge.
The instrument panel or dashboard contains a door ajar warning light.
The instrument panel or dashboard contains a battery warning light.
The instrument panel or dashboard contains a hand brake indicator.
The instrument panel or dashboard contains an oil pressure indicator.
The instrument panel or dashboard contains a high beam indicator.
The instrument panel or dashboard contains an engine check light.
The instrument panel or dashboard contains an empty fuel tank warning light.
Various driving controls include a wiper switch.
Various driving controls include a steering wheel.
Various driving controls include a horn.
Various driving controls include a direction indicator switch.
Various driving controls include an accelerator pedal.
Various driving controls include a brake pedal.
Various driving controls include a clutch pedal.
Various driving controls include a handbrake.
Various driving controls include a gear lever.
